* Iron Raptor crossed her arms and looked at Prowl and some of the other 
Maximals come up to her, noticing though that there weren't nearly enough 
around her as there was around FZ.*
< Thanx for the back-up, guys!> she thought bitterly as she kept her stance 
firm and kept her mouth shut at Dark Claw's comment. But she growled.
These Maximals weren't listening and now the Alliance making them and her 
look bad. She sighed. What else was new?
She knew that it wasn't right to think that way, but they just weren't 
listening!
Iron Raptor looked out across the field and saw more Maximals, ones which 
were not coming to her. Here eyes narrowed.
Opening a comm-link....*

" MAXIMALS!!!!!"Her voice booming over the communicator." GET YOUR SKIT 
PLATES OVER HERE ON THE DUBBLE!!! I don't care if you're being shot at, just 
cease fire, quit thinking of yourself and get over here now!"

* She was slagging sick of their ignoring her, there were more important 
thing going on here then theyr stupid battle! Like a crew member's life!
Iron Raptor kept her eyes towards the battle field, ready to meet every 
Maximal that came eye to eye. She was not happy!
But the ones that had come she was proud of, those were the Maximals she was 
looking forward to commanding in the future. And she knew, that inside of 
each Maximal, even the ones which had not some yet, there was loyalty 
waiting to get out.
Iron Raptor sighed and thought to Prowl....< What am I going to do? They 
won't listen. When did they get like this?>
But the Maximals weren�t all that bad, and even she had faults. Her temper 
for one, which was fairly pumped right now.
Iron Raptor stood facing the Maximals, glancing towards the ones that had 
already come.
This battle was going to end one way or another, with or without the 
Maximals. She couldn�t wait forever.*
< Come on, you guys! I know you can do better then this!>
